vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.10.26;
son of: Joktan (H3355);
brother of: Almodad (H0486), Hazarmaveth (H2700), Jerah (H3392), Hadoram (H1913A), Uzal (H0187), Diklah (H1853), Obal (H5745), Abimael (H0039), Sheba (H7614H), Ophir (H0211), Havilah (H2341I) and Jobab (H3103)
§ Sheleph = "a drawing forth"
the 2nd son of Joktan and a descendant of Shem
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Joctán; descendiente de Sem
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
沙列 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "拔出"
約坍的第二個兒子, 閃的後裔
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
沙列 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "拔出"
约坍的第二个儿子, 闪的后裔
